posts.content:
A nice example of a rare classic VW split screen 15 window LHD Kombi bus 1963, straight from the sunny climes of Brazil. The bus shows no signs of rust or rot on bodywork and floors. The interior is a standard 9 seat layout covered in black leather look effect, the Kombi is running on a twin carb 1600 engine, the engine runs smooth, and the bay is in excellent condition, also recently passing Brazil's regulatory inspection standards. Please note, this vehicle is not in the UK as of yet but is due to arrive end of September ready for viewings. All duty and taxes will be paid on this vehicle, HMRC NOVA and Brazilian logbook will be provided ready for its new owner to register in the UK, assistance can be given with DVLA forms if required. More pictures available https://www.facebook.com/pages/A-W-Clas ... 6173121712
Please contact Anderson for more details: 07500050884, 07717847840 or e-mail: ander.borinelli@hotmail.com
